citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
The facility was unable to provide the disposition records for one tiger and one fox as well as an updated copy of the
program of veterinary care. These documents were being kept at a different location and were unable to be furnished at
the time of inspection.
Failure to provide these documents hinders APHIS officials from confirming adequate veterinary care and from tracking
animals used in regulated activities to ensure their humane care, use, and disposition. The licensee must allow APHIS
officials to examine records required to be kept by the AWA.
To be corrected by February 16, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
The facility was unable to provide the disposition records for one tiger and one fox as well as an updated copy of the 
program of veterinary care. These documents were being kept at a different location and were unable to be furnished at 
the time of inspection.  
 
Failure to provide these documents hinders APHIS officials from confirming adequate veterinary care and from tracking 
animals used in regulated activities to ensure their humane care, use, and disposition. The licensee must allow APHIS 
officials to examine records required to be kept by the AWA.  
 
To be corrected by February 16, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n

species.common: RED FOX (INCLUDES SILVER FOX & CROSS FOX)
